card.name: Acolyte's Reward
card.text: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, where X is your devotion to white. If damage is prevented this way, Acolyte's Reward deals that much damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Aerie Worshippers
card.text: Inspired - Whenever Aerie Worshippers becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{U}. If you do, put a 2/2 blue Bird enchantment creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Akroan Conscriptor
card.text: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Conscriptor, gain control of another target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Akroan Phalanx
card.text: Vigilance {2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Akroan Skyguard
card.text: Flying Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Skyguard, put a +1/+1 counter on Akroan Skyguard.

card.name: Arbiter of the Ideal
card.text: Flying Inspired - Whenever Arbiter of the Ideal becomes untapped, reveal the top card of your library. If it's an artifact, creature, or land card, you may put it onto the battlefield with a manifestation counter on it. That permanent is an enchantment in addition to its other types.

card.name: Archetype of Aggression
card.text: Creatures you control have trample. Creatures your opponents control lose trample and can't have or gain trample.

card.name: Archetype of Courage
card.text: Creatures you control have first strike. Creatures your opponents control lose first strike and can't have or gain first strike.

card.name: Archetype of Endurance
card.text: Creatures you control have hexproof. Creatures your opponents control lose hexproof and can't have or gain hexproof.

card.name: Archetype of Finality
card.text: Creatures you control have deathtouch. Creatures your opponents control lose deathtouch and can't have or gain deathtouch.

card.name: Archetype of Imagination
card.text: Creatures you control have flying. Creatures your opponents control lose flying and can't have or gain flying.

card.name: Ashiok's Adept
card.text: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Ashiok's Adept, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Aspect of Hydra
card.text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is your devotion to green.

card.name: Asphyxiate
card.text: Destroy target untapped creature.

card.name: Astral Cornucopia
card.text: Astral Cornucopia enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. {T}: Choose a color. Add one mana of that color to your mana pool for each charge counter on Astral Cornucopia.

card.name: Bile Blight
card.text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get -3/-3 until end of turn.

card.name: Black Oak of Odunos
card.text: Defender {B}, Tap another untapped creature you control: Black Oak of Odunos gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Bolt of Keranos
card.text: Bolt of Keranos deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Scry 1.

card.name: Brimaz, King of Oreskos
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Brimaz, King of Oreskos attacks, put a 1/1 white Cat Soldier creature token with vigilance onto the battlefield attacking. Whenever Brimaz blocks a creature, put a 1/1 white Cat Soldier creature token with vigilance onto the battlefield blocking that creature.

card.name: Champion of Stray Souls
card.text: {3}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice X other creatures: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. {5}{B}{B}: Put Champion of Stray Souls on top of your library from your graveyard.

card.name: Chorus of the Tides
card.text: Flying Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Chorus of the Tides, scry 1.

card.name: Chromanticore
Claim of Erebos
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{1}{B}, {T}: Target player loses 2 life."

card.name: Courser of Kruphix
card.text: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play the top card of your library if it's a land card. Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Crypsis
card.text: Target creature you control gains protection from creatures your opponents control until end of turn. Untap it.

card.name: Culling Mark
card.text: Target creature blocks this turn if able.

card.name: Dawn to Dusk
card.text: Choose one or both - Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand; and/or destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Deepwater Hypnotist
card.text: Inspired - Whenever Deepwater Hypnotist becomes untapped, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Divination
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Drown in Sorrow
card.text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Scry 1.

card.name: Eater of Hope
card.text: Flying {B}, Sacrifice another creature: Regenerate Eater of Hope. {2}{B}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Destroy target creature.

card.name: Eidolon of Countless Battles
card.text: Bestow {2}{W}{W} Eidolon of Countless Battles and enchanted creature each get +1/+1 for each creature you control and +1/+1 for each Aura you control.

card.name: Elite Skirmisher
card.text: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Elite Skirmisher, you may tap target creature.

card.name: Ephara, God of the Polis
card.text: Indestructible As long as your devotion to white and blue is less than seven, Ephara isn't a creature. At the beginning of each upkeep, if you had another creature enter the battlefield under your control last turn, draw a card.

card.name: Ephara's Enlightenment
card.text: Enchant creature When Ephara's Enlightenment enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature. Enchanted creature has flying. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Ephara's Enlightenment to its owner's hand.

card.name: Ephara's Radiance
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{1}{W}, {T}: You gain 3 life."

card.name: Epiphany Storm
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card."

card.name: Eternity Snare
card.text: Enchant creature When Eternity Snare enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Evanescent Intellect
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{1}{U}, {T}: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard."

card.name: Everflame Eidolon
Excoriate
card.text: Exile target tapped creature.

card.name: Eye Gouge
card.text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. If it's a Cyclops, destroy it.

card.name: Fall of the Hammer
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to another target creature.

card.name: Fanatic of Xenagos
card.text: Trample Tribute 1 When Fanatic of Xenagos enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, it gets +1/+1 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Fate Unraveler
card.text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Fate Unraveler deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Fated Conflagration
card.text: Fated Conflagration deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If it's your turn, scry 2.

card.name: Fated Infatuation
card.text: Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of target creature you control. If it's your turn, scry 2.

card.name: Fated Intervention
card.text: Put two 3/3 green Centaur enchantment creature tokens onto the battlefield. If it's your turn, scry 2.

card.name: Fated Retribution
card.text: Destroy all creatures and planeswalkers. If it's your turn, scry 2.

card.name: Fated Return
card.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains indestructible. If it's your turn, scry 2.

card.name: Fearsome Temper
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{2}{R}: Target creature can't block this creature this turn."

card.name: Felhide Brawler
card.text: Felhide Brawler can't block unless you control another Minotaur.

card.name: Felhide Spiritbinder
card.text: Inspired - Whenever Felhide Spiritbinder becomes untapped, you may pay {1}{R}. If you do, put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of another target creature except it's an enchantment in addition to its other types. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Flame-Wreathed Phoenix
card.text: Flying Tribute 2 When Flame-Wreathed Phoenix enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, return it to its owner's hand."

card.name: Flitterstep Eidolon
Floodtide Serpent
card.text: Floodtide Serpent can't attack unless you return an enchantment you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Forgestoker Dragon
card.text: Flying {1}{R}: Forgestoker Dragon deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this combat. Activate this ability only if Forgestoker Dragon is attacking.

card.name: Forlorn Pseudamma
card.text: Intimidate Inspired - Whenever Forlorn Pseudamma becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, put a 2/2 black Zombie enchantment creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Forsaken Drifters
card.text: When Forsaken Drifters dies, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.

card.name: Ghostblade Eidolon
Gild
card.text: Exile target creature. Put a colorless artifact token named Gold onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Glimpse the Sun God
card.text: Tap X target creatures. Scry 1.

card.name: God-Favored General
card.text: Inspired - Whenever God-Favored General becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{W}. If you do, put two 1/1 white Soldier enchantment creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Gorgon's Head
card.text: Equipped creature has deathtouch. Equip {2}

card.name: Graverobber Spider
card.text: Reach {3}{B}: Graverobber Spider gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Griffin Dreamfinder
card.text: Flying When Griffin Dreamfinder enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Grisly Transformation
card.text: Enchant creature When Grisly Transformation enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has intimidate.

card.name: Herald of Torment
card.text: Bestow {3}{B}{B} Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life. Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has flying.

card.name: Hero of Iroas
card.text: Aura spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Hero of Iroas, put a +1/+1 counter on Hero of Iroas.

card.name: Hero of Leina Tower
card.text: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Hero of Leina Tower, you may pay {X}. If you do, put X +1/+1 counters on Hero of Leina Tower.

card.name: Heroes' Podium
card.text: Each legendary creature you control gets +1/+1 for each other legendary creature you control. {X}, {T}: Look at the top X cards of your library. You may reveal a legendary creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Hold at Bay
card.text: Prevent the next 7 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Hunter's Prowess
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards."

card.name: Impetuous Sunchaser
card.text: Flying, haste Impetuous Sunchaser attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Karametra, God of Harvests
card.text: Indestructible As long as your devotion to green and white is less than seven, Karametra isn't a creature. Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may search your library for a Forest or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Karametra's Favor
card.text: Enchant creature When Karametra's Favor enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Kiora, the Crashing Wave
card.text: +1: Until your next turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target permanent an opponent controls. -1: Draw a card. You may play an additional land this turn. -5: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, put a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token onto the battlefield."

card.name: Kiora's Follower
card.text: {T}: Untap another target permanent.

card.name: Kragma Butcher
card.text: Inspired - Whenever Kragma Butcher becomes untapped, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Kraken of the Straits
card.text: Creatures with power less than the number of Islands you control can't block Kraken of the Straits.

card.name: Lightning Volley
card.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."

card.name: Loyal Pegasus
card.text: Flying Loyal Pegasus can't attack or block alone.

card.name: Marshmist Titan
card.text: Marshmist Titan costs {X} less to cast, where X is your devotion to black.

card.name: Meletis Astronomer
card.text: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Meletis Astronomer, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Mindreaver
card.text: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Mindreaver, exile the top three cards of target player's library. {U}{U}, Sacrifice Mindreaver: Counter target spell with the same name as a card exiled with Mindreaver.

card.name: Mischief and Mayhem
card.text: Up to two target creatures each get +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Mogis, God of Slaughter
card.text: Indestructible As long as your devotion to black and red is less than seven, Mogis isn't a creature. At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Mogis deals 2 damage to that player unless he or she sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Mortal's Ardor
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Mortal's Resolve
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Necrobite
card.text: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. Regenerate it.

card.name: Nessian Demolok
card.text: Tribute 3 When Nessian Demolok enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, destroy target noncreature permanent.

card.name: Nessian Wilds Ravager
card.text: Tribute 6 When Nessian Wilds Ravager enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, you may have Nessian Wilds Ravager fight another target creature.

card.name: Noble Quarry
Nullify
card.text: Counter target creature or Aura spell.

card.name: Nyxborn Eidolon
card.text: Bestow {4}{B} Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.

card.name: Nyxborn Rollicker
card.text: Bestow {1}{R} Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

card.name: Nyxborn Shieldmate
card.text: Bestow {2}{W} Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

card.name: Nyxborn Triton
card.text: Bestow {4}{U} Enchanted creature gets +2/+3.

card.name: Nyxborn Wolf
card.text: Bestow {4}{G} Enchanted creature gets +3/+1.

card.name: Odunos River Trawler
card.text: When Odunos River Trawler enters the battlefield, return target enchantment creature card from your graveyard to your hand. {W}, Sacrifice Odunos River Trawler: Return target enchantment creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Oracle of Bones
card.text: Haste Tribute 2 When Oracle of Bones enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, you may cast an instant or sorcery card from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Oracle's Insight
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Scry 1, then draw a card."

card.name: Oreskos Sun Guide
card.text: Inspired - Whenever Oreskos Sun Guide becomes untapped, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Ornitharch
card.text: Flying Tribute 2 When Ornitharch enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, put two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Pain Seer
card.text: Inspired - Whenever Pain Seer becomes untapped, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Peregrination
card.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Shuffle your library, then scry 1.

card.name: Perplexing Chimera
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may exchange control of Perplexing Chimera and that spell. If you do, you may choose new targets for the spell.

card.name: Pharagax Giant
card.text: Tribute 2 When Pharagax Giant enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, Pharagax Giant deals 5 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Phenax, God of Deception
card.text: Indestructible As long as your devotion to blue and black is less than seven, Phenax isn't a creature. Creatures you control have "{T}: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is this creature's toughness."

card.name: Pheres-Band Raiders
card.text: Inspired - Whenever Pheres-Band Raiders becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, put a 3/3 green Centaur enchantment creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Pheres-Band Tromper
card.text: Inspired - Whenever Pheres-Band Tromper becomes untapped, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Pillar of War
card.text: Defender As long as Pillar of War is enchanted, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Pinnacle of Rage
card.text: Pinnacle of Rage deals 3 damage to each of two target creatures and/or players.

card.name: Plea for Guidance
card.text: Search your library for up to two enchantment cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Ragemonger
card.text: Minotaur spells you cast cost {B}{R} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay.

card.name: Raised by Wolves
card.text: Enchant creature When Raised by Wolves enters the battlefield, put two 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens onto the battlefield. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Wolf you control.

card.name: Reap What Is Sown
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three target creatures.

card.name: Reckless Reveler
card.text: {R}, Sacrifice Reckless Reveler: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Retraction Helix
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gains "{T}: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand."

card.name: Revoke Existence
card.text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Rise to the Challenge
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Sanguimancy
card.text: You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is your devotion to black.

card.name: Satyr Firedancer
card.text: Whenever an instant or sorcery spell you control deals damage to an opponent, Satyr Firedancer deals that much damage to target creature that player controls.

card.name: Satyr Nyx-Smith
card.text: Haste Inspired - Whenever Satyr Nyx-Smith becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, put a 3/1 red Elemental enchantment creature token with haste onto the battlefield.

card.name: Satyr Wayfinder
card.text: When Satyr Wayfinder enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Scourge of Skola Vale
card.text: Trample Scourge of Skola Vale enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a number of +1/+1 counters on Scourge of Skola Vale equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

card.name: Scouring Sands
card.text: Scouring Sands deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Scry 1.

card.name: Searing Blood
card.text: Searing Blood deals 2 damage to target creature. When that creature dies this turn, Searing Blood deals 3 damage to the creature's controller.

card.name: Servant of Tymaret
card.text: Inspired - Whenever Servant of Tymaret becomes untapped, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. {2}{B}: Regenerate Servant of Tymaret.

card.name: Setessan Oathsworn
card.text: Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Setessan Oathsworn, put two +1/+1 counters on Setessan Oathsworn.

card.name: Setessan Starbreaker
card.text: When Setessan Starbreaker enters the battlefield, you may destroy target Aura.

card.name: Shrike Harpy
card.text: Flying Tribute 2 When Shrike Harpy enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, target opponent sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Silent Sentinel
card.text: Flying Whenever Silent Sentinel attacks, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Siren of the Fanged Coast
card.text: Flying Tribute 3 When Siren of the Fanged Coast enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, gain control of target creature.

card.name: Siren of the Silent Song
card.text: Flying Inspired - Whenever Siren of the Silent Song becomes untapped, each opponent discards a card, then puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Siren Song Lyre
card.text: Equipped creature has "{2}, {T}: Tap target creature." Equip {2}

card.name: Skyreaping
card.text: Skyreaping deals damage to each creature with flying equal to your devotion to green.

card.name: Snake of the Golden Grove
card.text: Tribute 3 When Snake of the Golden Grove enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Sphinx's Disciple
card.text: Flying Inspired - Whenever Sphinx's Disciple becomes untapped, draw a card.

card.name: Spirit of the Labyrinth
card.text: Each player can't draw more than one card each turn.

card.name: Spiteful Returned
Springleaf Drum
card.text: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Stormcaller of Keranos
card.text: Haste {1}{U}: Scry 1.

card.name: Stratus Walk
card.text: Enchant creature When Stratus Walk enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has flying. Enchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Sudden Storm
card.text: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps. Scry 1.

card.name: Sunbond
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on this creature."

card.name: Temple of Enlightenment
card.text: Temple of Enlightenment enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Enlightenment enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Temple of Malice
card.text: Temple of Malice enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Malice enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Temple of Plenty
card.text: Temple of Plenty enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Plenty enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Thassa's Rebuff
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is your devotion to blue.

card.name: Thunder Brute
card.text: Trample Tribute 3 When Thunder Brute enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, it gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Thunderous Might
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is your devotion to red.

card.name: Tromokratis
card.text: Tromokratis has hexproof unless it's attacking or blocking. Tromokratis can't be blocked unless all creatures defending player controls block it.

card.name: Unravel the AEther
card.text: Choose target artifact or enchantment. Its owner shuffles it into his or her library.

card.name: Vanguard of Brimaz
card.text: Vigilance Heroic - Whenever you cast a spell that targets Vanguard of Brimaz, put a 1/1 white Cat Soldier creature token with vigilance onto the battlefield.

card.name: Vortex Elemental
card.text: {U}: Put Vortex Elemental and each creature blocking or blocked by it on top of their owners' libraries, then those players shuffle their libraries. {3}{U}{U}: Target creature blocks Vortex Elemental this turn if able.

card.name: Warchanter of Mogis
card.text: Inspired - Whenever Warchanter of Mogis becomes untapped, target creature you control gains intimidate until end of turn.

card.name: Weight of the Underworld
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -3/-2.

card.name: Whelming Wave
card.text: Return all creatures to their owners' hands except for Krakens, Leviathans, Octopuses, and Serpents.

card.name: Whims of the Fates
card.text: Starting with you, each player separates all permanents he or she controls into three piles. Then each player chooses one of his or her piles at random and sacrifices those permanents.

card.name: Xenagos, God of Revels
card.text: Indestructible As long as your devotion to red and green is less than seven, Xenagos isn't a creature. At the beginning of combat on your turn, another target creature you control gains haste and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that creature's power.
